item.title: Sometimes you’ll say oh Ben, but this time you’ll say thank you Ben!
Yes - you - do - Gu - shue!
Where’s this roll going to go? Nowhere
Won’t get through, not cleared for landing!
The air should have moved it!
He’s a human pebbling can out there
Hebert will be the headlights
Coming through, coming through, coming through! Wow
One there, one there, one there … that’s three!
It’s been a Tuesday afternoon delight
As the hand goes up, Gushue draws the four-foot, and the girls are happy!
Like that, like that, exactly like that for two!
Sixteen stones result in one point
It’s hard not to sneak a peek
I don’t think you want to have that puzzled look so early
Flemming, doing the bunny-hop!
Don’t be gentle! There you go.
If they can, if they can, if they can, they do!
Abracadabra, Val makes them disappear!
I understand those naps are kind of good
Margot Flemming! And the second straight end she’s come up with a house-buster
item.description: — 2025 Scotties, Quarter Final - AB-SK vs NS

item.title: And it will be, and it is not
A couple of gifts handed back and forth, and Ontario was the last to unwrap
Ontario thought they gave it away, Skrlik then said return to sender
Weak start, strong finish!
That door just opened, and Black walked through with two
She’s going to lose that one, and she’s going to lose the game
There’s one, there’s two, there’s three, there’s four!
What did Christina Black pull out of her hat? A little black magic!
Where’s this stone going to be? Nowhere.
Well played game for Margot Flemming
So a splish, but no splash
He loooooves his chicken!
That gauge is called a thermometer … I wasn’t going to stick it there
It is, or it will be. If you put them together, it'll'm
Somebody will write a curling comic book about him: The Flasch
Still can't touch the Great Wall of Regina
Are we looking at Cinder-fella?!
Hope he wins tonight, or he will be a done-stone
He doesn't want to go Oromoct-O-and-7
The bees, the bees, the bees!
I'm not laughing out loud, I'm inwardly laughing
Rachel Homan, for a time, couldn’t even spell draw
And a 12-foot game becomes a 4-foot game
Someone check the stones for Velcro, they just will not move!
Right, pause, left, here it comes!
MacCuish push!
Let’s go for a walk ladies, let’s go for a walk.
Margot Flemming
The differences in the coaches-ing.
Mom might have a talk with you later.
That silly stone over there on the right-hand side
What would you like? Fries? Hamburger, maybe?
Unless she falls down, or throws it to Canmore, it's going to be a two.
Jones had the chance to close the door, left it open. Homan walks through for one.
Everything has been a Cirque du Soleil shot so far for Laurie St. George
Are you giving this away? Are you going to give this away?? You did.
Bang, Bang, Bang, Bang, Hello, GOODBYE!!
A dandy by Grandy
Who makes the last mistake?

item.title: The brushing Bee Gees: staying alive, staying alive!
So a little bit of a change in strategy for the Canadians - make the Dutch make some shots
Crunch crunch, and now 1-2-3
We will be cheering every stone of the way
item.description: — 2022 Women’s Worlds, Final - Switzerland vs Korea

item.title: Makes the little bump, a little pooch as they say
It's a three-for-all!
Assume the positions!
Morris on top, and all kinds of pressure
Everybody take a stone!
The battle of the so-far-winless
Paul Flemming is 53 ... we're not quite sure if there's a future left for him
I'm getting very good at my zeroes
You know, watching is different than driving
Pucker up! Oh, you don't get there
A force is a force, of course
Oh, the sound of the moose running loose
So here we go, click click click click click click click click click click, tiebreaker!
It is going, and going, and going … and it is gone
She learns a lot from you, and falls asleep with me
Not the pinball wizard ...
Oh very nice, Margot Flemming!
No knockout punch, but a nice little jab of 2
So the student smacks the teacher with a 5
So the stealers get stolen
That, Cathy, is how you park a horse

item.title: They'll lose like they've never lost before
Lose, Win, Lose, Win, UH! ... Lose

Go one way, get the elastic band tight, and back the other way

item.title: It’s a fight here, it’s a fight! And they’re going to lose it
You build up muscle in your arms, but that brain muscle too, and that is still to come for some of these teams
In a game where he has struggled with the weight, suddenly the weight is off his shoulders
Look at it go, back up, sideways, all directions!
Catcher in the Red
That’s five on this hand, and one on that hand
There’s the Christmas tree, but he crashed. The bough fell down
From control to doubt, just like that
Got a little train going here
The feet moved, the brush didn’t
Can you squeeze it, can you squish it?
You’re the next contestant. Here we go to the edge of the button!
She was Cinderella in a slider
She’s got the shovel out, she’s bailing!
Margot Flemming!
Friday morning, and the screw finally comes loose
Japan starts with a J

item.title: Thomas ‘I think I can, I think I can, I think I can, and yes I can!’ Scoffin
Ohhhh it’s gonna be a bumpy night
There’s one Gushue guy actually, on the end there …
People are going to be mush by the end of this
Don’t share your nickels
It’s funny how the curling rock spins sometimes
Don’t tell me, don’t tell me, OH THAT CLOSE!
Forget the 71, thats 100%! Maybe 105 if you add bonus points …
By my count, that was my 12th good point
Oooh I’m gonna get you, you’re not getting in …
Schmeared it out the back, for a 3!
Didn’t get all the wheels down …
Like finding an easter egg, there it is!
It’s better than close, it’s brilliant!
Oh boy, that was a rough landing
That just clunked like a bad transmission
That was a sou'wester, that one
Those stones have had some lives, haven’t they
Okay, let’s put on the hindsight glasses
That sizzling you hear is me …
The broom slam made a bigger noise than the shot
You can remember when it was a toaster that you played for, and when the prize money increased it became a four slice toaster

item.title: Silvana just doesn’t have that stomach we’re talking about
Bang! And there they go like a couple of niblets …
Sometimes their success comes from the fact that they can speak properly and I can’t
He just absolutely surgically cut that out of there!
Welding torches are out!
I am a man of few words
Back 4 … Back 12 … Back seat of a car in the parking lot …
He’s throwing a dart … and he’ll get a bullseye!

item.title: As soon as the camera goes away you know he’s just going to stuff his face

item.title: Taking advantage of an Alberta stuff, Saskatchewan comes up with the stuff!
It’s like it was on a string, yo-yo for the win!
If you drive that bus, be gentle.
That’s the double-stuff, that’s the Oreo!
Well played? Not necessarily.
They missed a few classes in school, didn’t they …
They saw it, and more importantly - they made it!
I think the cat has the advantage at the moment
At least I’m on the right continent …
That’s a wide-eyed-where’s-this-gonna-go kind of rock
I’m like one of those scrambled eggs - a little fried
Sorry, you weren’t wearing your nametag today
Ya, you just bang that gong. That was great!
Bam, Bam! Fred and Wilma would be proud
Stuff-stuff and now you’re in tough!
You always remember your first … and that was my first
I’m really sorry I picked up the phone when you guys called …

item.title: They love that last rock, they don’t want to give it away!
So he says: Come and get me! If you want to win, come and get me!
I just remembered that your clock is broken
Just so you know, those naps are really good
It’s gonna really take a pounding here!
That’s a snackable stone!
If this was another sport, you’d be looking for a lack of effort
Calling Dr. Jacobs for surgery!
I have a booth similar to this built at home, and I go in it and I sit in it, and I have my two people over here I pretend are there, and I talk to them

item.title: In the grocery store, throwing a can of peas …
Have we been together too long?
The judge gives the award to “into the fryer” … and this judge does accept bribes

Paul Flemming is the best player on the ice
So I practice with myself. Basically, that’s all I do
You don’t ever want it to be a curved landing strip
Sylvie Robichaud decides to dance!
4! I had to un-curl my fingers
This is your captain speaking: we are seeing one heck of a game!
Well, they won an event in Whitby, Ontario …
For some teams it’s already been a bump bump bump bump
That’s my middle name: Cheesy

That means they need to pick this up and put it on their backs

Team Canada, moving on up to a deluxe apartment!

That is called picking the pocket!
Oh, HONEY I’M HOME!!!
Crack the two ears on Mickey’s ears, and away they go!
Up the back end goes, and here we go!
Who saw that surgery?!
And then the dance of the stones by Kennedy!
A,B,C … and we’re playing on D!

item.title: If you add up all the fingers, it could be 3 or 4!
There’s a Saskatchewan girl in Val Sweeting
She just squished the meat out of that sandwich
They have a little bit of a thinking problem
Can she get the Buffalo back on top?
Put one hand away and count ‘em up! 1-2-3-4-and-5!
They stole that from Star Trek: ‘may the force be with you’

item.title: Here’s the first test, and they fail it
Look who is shitting
It takes a thief tonight!
Sharp, sharp, sharp
Sweden, the thief so far!
I love it when they back up
Lovely, lovely, lovely, that’s a scootch!
Has the game gotten to a point that you would *intentionally* put a left-hander on your team?
Quebec: one, two, three, draw, four!
No poutine between ends
Wouldn’t it be funny if I showed up driving the train?
Do you speak Swedish?
Our theme of the night is Niklas Edin
Oh no, no, no. Cici says “no no”!
If I could just scratch at Ryan Fry
What’s the Swedish word for messy?
What’s he on? Red, red, red, red.
He’s had an eye, Ryan Fry!
Push one, roll one, push one! TWO!
You thought it was going to clunk the red all day
Oh no, oh no. Oh no! OH YES!
Xiaoming Xu, showing us his English!
If you want to be better, you’ve got to get as good as they are
I’m not sure there’s much curl in that head

item.title: How difficult is this?
Oh more than close, that’s great!
Called perfectly, thrown perfectly, brushed perfectly!
What a HONEY of a shot!
It’s like a little nest in there!
This is an ad for a fitness magazine, let me tell you
Wild!
I know you don’t have the hammer, but would you consider throwing a corner guard so they can’t tick it?
Oh, Heather Nedohin with her sugar balls
